publication.title: Microbiological and Nutritional Analysis of Lettuce Crops Grown on the International Space Station

assays: heterotrophic plate counts for bacteria and fungi
isolate identification using samples taken from the leaves and roots
molecular characterization using Next Generation Sequencing (NGS)

results.effect: differences in total counts for bacteria and yeast/molds
variation in the diversity of genera between leaf and root tissue with diversity being higher in root tissue

results.target: elemental composition, phenolics, anthocyanins, and ORAC levels
results.effect: differences in Fe, K, Na, P, S, and Zn content and total phenolic levels
